channel.title: Homo sexuality
channel.description:
hey i dont plan on being mean or hurtfull, i just wanted to know what you guys thing about homosexuality,
i say they should all be shot! lol, but thats a bit cruel, they should all be shipped to a special island and keep bum raping eachother and become inbred!

item.title: Homo sexuality
item.dc:creator: @OnlyOneRule OnlyOneRule
item.description:
@OnlyOneRule wrote:

ok i updated the options, i hope no one has any more problemes with imaturity

Read full topic

item.title: Homo sexuality
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

therealjdb:

All right I’m not sure where to start. Well first if you wanted to have an actual debate about this topic you could’ve at least made some sensible options for the poll, whereas this poll already gives you a biased standpoint. Now, I do not personally accept gays but I accept the fact that they do and will continue to exist. I think that if it is something you inherit then eventually the gays should die out, but that is why I don’t believe that, I think that gay is nurture over nature not vice versa. So in short as long as they keep to themselves then I really don’t care.

I think most things in life are nurture over nature.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @dbzmaster555 dbzmaster
item.description:
@dbzmaster555 wrote:

Being gay is not nature but if lesbins wanted to adopt me hell yeah I would go but two gay guys hellllzzzzz no I do not accept gay guys and I never will,but what jb said they will exist but they will die out.

Read full topic

item.title: Homo sexuality
item.dc:creator: @sparkz sparkz
item.description:
@sparkz wrote:

[quote=“OnlyOneRule, post:29, topic:128807”][quote author=Click Here link=topic=179431.msg1641682#msg1641682 date=1185926652]

I find it interesting because a complete and utter idiot made the topic. People like YOU are the ones who deserve to be killed. You’re a messed up little boy who’s just copying what a vast majority of young people think. Just because YOU don’t approve of it doesn’t mean it’s wrong or they should be killed or segregated you sick, sick little child.

your funny

your immature END OF
[/quote]

ok then… ill settle for immature, please note thats beacuase im dyslexic

[hr]

please lock, i thought people would have actually taken this more mature[/quote]

So how would you like it if I made a thread now about whether or not retards should be killed?

Gay people don’t bother me.

Read full topic

i dont understand why people have a problem with gays. its not like there running the streets just walking up to everyone and bum raping them. 70% of gay people arent like wereing pink and talking stupid, so how can you even tell who is gay. anyways if they get married its the end of there blood line so who cares
[/quote]

I actually saw a flaming homo on the streets the other day. He was wearing baby blue.

And what if they adopt? Those poor kids.[/quote]

usually gays arent allowed to adopt, esspecially not women for some reason, unless the child is old and more mature, but then the child gets to make up the descission
